sections.heading: or trespass; remainderman; reversioner; rights
sections.text: The owner of an estate in remainder or reversion, may maintain an action for trespass or waste for injuries done to the inheritance, notwithstanding any intervening estate for life or years.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 638, p. 506;R.S.1913, ยง 8249;C.S.1922, ยง
